extensionDescription.message: Category manager for contacts. Also allows to send an email to all members of a category (a.k.a category based contact groups).

sendtocategory.bulkedit.legend.double.message: E-mail address was found in multiple contacts. Please select the which of these contacts should be added to the category.

sendtocategory.bulkedit.legend.notok.message: E-mail address was not found in the address book. A new contact needs to be created and will be added to the category.

sendtocategory.bulkedit.legend.ok.message: E-mail address could be unambiguously assigned to a contact, and this contact will be added to the category.

sendtocategory.bulkedit.legend.okdouble.message: E-mail address was found in multiple contacts. However, one of these contacts is already assigned to this category and has been automatically selected.

sendtocategory.bulkedit.membersWithoutPr.message: This category contains ##counts## contacts without an associated email address. The category information of these contacts cannot be edited with this dialog. They are not shown in the list above.

sendtocategory.bulkedit.save.title.message: The following changes have been applied to category ##name##:

sendtocategory.catsedit.desc.message: Please define, if all, none or a subset of the selected contacts should be part of category ##name##.

sendtocategory.catsedit.label.in.message: Subset of the selected contacts which should be part of category ##name##:

sendtocategory.catsedit.title.message: Edit category membership of selected contacts

sendtocategory.confirm.delete.message: This action will change the category-property of ##number## contacts, the membership to category [##oldname##] will be removed. This cannot be undone, do you want to continue?

sendtocategory.confirm.rename.message: This action will change the category-property of ##number## contacts, the membership to category [##oldname##] will be replaced by a membership to category [##newname##]. This cannot be undone, do you want to continue?

sendtocategory.error.add.message: The category [##newname##] cannot be added], cause a category with that name already exists.

sendtocategory.error.rename.message: The category [##oldname##] cannot be renamed to [##newname##], cause a category with that name already exists.

sendtocategory.info.add.message: The new category [##newname##] has not yet been connected to a contact. If you close the addressbook without assigning a contact, the newly created category will be removed.

sendtocategory.pref.addressbooktab.remem.message: If the thunderbird addressbook is opened, usually the first found addressbook will be displayed. With this option set, the last used addressbook will be displayed.

sendtocategory.pref.generaltab.toaddr.de.message: Due to german data protection laws, it is not allowed* to insert all members of a list into the 'to:' or 'cc:' field, because it will reveal all email addresses to all list members.

Therefore, all category members wil be inserted into the 'bcc:' field. However, such an email will not have a visible receipient; depending on the email client, it will display something like 'undisclosed-recipients:;' instead. It is common to include an additional recipient - for all to see - into the 'to:' field (your own address or a no-reply address), which has the name of the list as its display name. It is mostly not possible to use a non-existing email address, because most mail servers will reject those emails.
If this field remains empty, the name of the list (inside brackets) will be added to the subject of the email, to identify the email as part of a list.

sendtocategory.pref.generaltab.toaddr.la.message: optional 'to:' address (visible for everybody, the displayed name is the name of the list)

sendtocategory.wizard.export.desc.message: Export has finished, ##EXPORTNUM## contacts{{ of category '##CAT##'}} from address book '##BOOK##' have been exported.

sendtocategory.wizard.export.options.cat.message: Export the affiliation to category '##CAT##' and its subcategories. Ignore all other categories and the above export selection for the category field.

sendtocategory.wizard.export.options.csv.message: Please set the properties of the CSV file.
Please select data fields for export.

sendtocategory.wizard.import.control.des.message: The following contacts and data fields will be imported (empty columns are not shown):

sendtocategory.wizard.import.desc.message: Import has finished, ##IMPORTNUM## contacts have been imported into address book '##BOOK##'{{ and also added to category '##CAT##' }}. Furthermore, the imported contacts have been added to the category '##TIMECAT##'  for easy identification.

sendtocategory.wizard.import.error.csv.message: The selected CSV file could not be imported, because its lines do not contain the same number of fields.

sendtocategory.wizard.import.error.empty.message: The selected file is empty. Aborting import.

sendtocategory.wizard.import.error.reser.message: The field name '##fieldname##' is reserved and cannot be used. Please rename the field or disable its import.

sendtocategory.wizard.import.mapping.csv.message: The following table lists all found data fields. Each data field can be selected for import and can be mapped onto a standard thunderbird field or onto a custom field. For complex mapping it is often faster to edit the CSV file before import.
Additional import settings for CSV files

sendtocategory.wizard.import.options.csv.message: The following properties of the CSV file have been recognized:

sendtocategory.wizard.mode.desc.message: This wizard will guide you through the import/export process of your contacts.

sendtocategory.wizard.mode.import.message: Import contacts {{into category '##CAT##' }}into address book '##BOOK##'. All imported contacts will also be addedto the category '##TIMECAT##'.
